raw_body: Safe in the arms of Jesus”, passed away peacefully in her sleep on 10th April 2024. Beloved wife of the late Fred, devoted mother of Jeremy, mother-in-law of Rebecca, grandmother of Shannon and Tanya, Chasnyn and Robert and Maxine, great grandmother of Micah, Violet, Luca, Ivy and baby Olive, sister of the late Doreen, Aubrey and Trevor, much loved sister-in-law and aunt, and friend to many. The remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour
